features: FOR ALL HAIR TYPES - GIOVANNI Tea Tree Triple Treat Invigorating Conditioner helps scalp circulation, leaving dry or damaged hair feeling refreshed and renewed with every use
NOURISHING MOISTURIZER - Our tea tree conditioner successfully alleviates dry, flaking scalps by using an organic tea tree botanical formula, making it perfect for those who need help removing flakes
ORGANIC OILS - The aloe vera lavender, rosemary, and other botanical oils effectively restore strength and luster while conditioning, calming, and detangling hair for easy comb-out and styling
VEGAN FRIENDLY - GIOVANNI products use organic ingredients and are Leaping Bunny Certified. GIOVANNI products are cruelty-free and come in sophisticated recyclable packaging
ECO CHIC - GIOVANNI has been bridging the gap between natural and salon-quality hair care since 1979. We strive to use the very best ingredients and are always focused on high performance
body.description: GIOVANNI Tea Tree Triple Treat Invigorating Conditioner increases scalp circulation, leaving your hair feeling refreshed and renewed with every use. GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care line in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eco Chic Hair Care Invigorating Hair Care Eco Chic helps repair dry, damaged, and color-treated hair. The invigorating ingredients rejuvenate your hair whether you're cleansing, conditioning, hydrating, or holding. Botanical Extracts Looking to rejuvenate, strengthen, and gorgeously restore your hair? Eco Chic formulas are bursting with nutrients and organic-oil blends. Luxurious Appearance Conditioning rosemary and clarifying eucalyptus are added to help you regain that luxurious appearance and softness once again. Eco Chic is for hair that looks and feels flawless. Cruelty-Free Eco Chic products are Lauryl and Laureth Sulfate-free. We don’t add harsh chemicals, or artificial dyes, and never test on animals!

Filled With Botanical Ingredients List of Botanical Extracts: *Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, *Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, *Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Oil, *Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Leaf Extract, *Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, *Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, *Thymus Vulgaris (Thyme) Extract *USDA Certified Organic Ingredient. (Awarded in 2020) For a complete list of ingredients please reference the ingredients label on the back of the product. Paraben-Free Vegan Friendly Color-Safe Eco Chic Eco Chic Tea Tree Triple Treat Invigorating Conditioner You expect a conditioner to moisturize, smooth and detangle. You expect it to create a silky, sexy feel. You probably don’t expect it to make you tingle all over. With Tea Tree Triple Treat Invigorating Conditioner, an incredible plethora of stimulating ingredients provides all that plus a real treat for hair: excitement. Who knew that conditioning could be so top of mind? Increases scalp circulation for a refreshed, renewed feel Strengthens hair with a three-organic-oil blend to stimulate, condition and clarify Helps alleviate dry, flaking scalp with organic Tea Tree botanicals Peppermint Scented

Giovanni...Bridging the Gap Between Natural & Salon Quality OUR INGREDIENTS Our products are formulated using a number of organic ingredients, we are Leaping Bunny Certified and the vast majority of our products are vegan friendly. OUR COMMUNITY Giovanni enjoys partnering with Eco Chic women (& men) who use their everyday gifts to do something beautiful in our world and local communities. OUR STORY Giovanni was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural products stores, and today continues to Bridge the Gap between Natural and Salon-Quality hair care. OUR COMMITMENT Since 1979 the Giovanni Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance.

Eco Chic Tea Tree Triple Treat Invigorating Conditioner Eco Chic L.A. Hold Styling Gel Eco Chic Direct Leave-In Conditioner Eco Chic Frizz Be Gone Serum Eco Chic L.A. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed! Love Love love this product and the shampoo as well!
reviews.reviewText: At the risk of sounding like a broken record, if you've already read my review of Giovanni's Triple Threat shampoo, I'm truly utterly amazed with this conditioner. Besides the amazing certified organic and vegan ingredients, the fragrance, the luxurious conditioning emollients, the truly invigorating sensation my scalp receives immediately upon applying, this product along with the shampoo has completely reversed my dry scalp and dandruff. I've heard amazing things about Tea Tree oil for dandruff and dry scalp. Believe me, IT WORKS. No more synthetic chemicals. But add rosemary and peppermint to the mix and you also have the perfect conditioner to support hair growth and reduce hair loss. And it's a great detangler to boot! When you love something this much AND you can buy the gallon salon size, what could be better? Less environmental waste, too? What a perfect product! Bravo, Giovanni! Bravo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a good, basic, daily conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Really like this product. Leaves hair soft and manageable without a heavy, filmy, or greasy after-feel. Nice tea tree scent that does not overwhelm. Great value in the gallon size, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite co-wash
reviews.reviewText: I have very low porosity wavy hair and this is the most refreshing conditioner. Tea tree makes my scalp feel clean and tingly. The conditioner does suds up but it is very gentle and doesn’t strip the hair while it takes off build-up. Not very conditioning which is why I use it as a co-wash instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this conditioner almost as a leave in. I use Nioxin shampoo for thinning hair. But it can be a little strong so I condition with this to invigorate the scalp, do a quick rinse, but leave some in. So far it is working better than any other conditioner I have tried. One of the things I like the most is that it is light weight even tho I don’t completely rinse. It is hard to get the moisture balance right between to oily & too dry, for me this does the trick. I do use a lot of it at a time, probably different for everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells good but doesn’t detangle well
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I wanted a tea tree based conditioner. I have 2C hair. It’s thick but when it comes to detangling, I have to use loads of product because it doesn’t work too well with detangling. I do notice a big difference in my hair color. It’s more vibrant and silky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this conditioner. I have fine, thin hair that has been thinning for years and its hard to find a conditioner that doesn't weigh my hair down and make it look thin. This conditioner makes my hair look SO bouncy, full, and healthy and I've gotten tons of compliments on my hair since I started using this months ago. Yes, it's not the most conditioning/detangling, but I detangle my hair before showering. It makes my hair soft and shiny. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shampoo ever
reviews.reviewText: I received this shampoo several years ago in a FABFITFUN subscription box and have been using it ever since for my entire family. It cleans our hair making it soft and manageable. It is also very affordable. I have tried other more expensive shampoos, however, this one works the best.

reviews.reviewTitle: no tan bueno como su hermano
reviews.reviewText: lo compré porque no estaba disponibles el leave-in, y pues no, a la otra me espero
Buen tamaño, llevo 2 meses usandolo y todavia no se me acaba
